migrations.description: Remove the deprecated `external` and `externalBuildTargets` options from the `@nx/js:swc` and `@nx/js:tsc` executors.
migrations.name: remove-external-options-from-js-executors

migrations.description: Remove deprecated deleteOutputPath and sassImplementation options from @nx/webpack:webpack
migrations.name: update-22-0-0-remove-deprecated-options

migrations.description: Updates webpack configs using React to use the new withSvgr composable function instead of the svgr option in withReact or NxReactWebpackPlugin.
migrations.name: update-22-0-0-add-svgr-to-webpack-config

migrations.description: Remove deprecated deleteOutputPath and sassImplementation options from rspack configurations.
migrations.name: remove-deprecated-rspack-options

migrations.description: Updates next.config.js files to add SVGR webpack configuration directly instead of using the nx.svgr option in withNx.
migrations.name: update-22-0-0-add-svgr-to-next-config
